scripts.build: echo 'No build step needed - remote shell app'
scripts.build:debug:
cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && echo '
✅ APK: android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk'
scripts.build:release:
cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && echo '
✅ AAB: android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab'
